posts.text: How do I get better at solving algorithm problems? I freeze when the question looks long.
Best way to prepare for a finance internship if I donâ€™t have experience?
Should I switch majors from biology to data science? I like math but not labs.

comments.author: ethan
comments.content: Try solving easier problems first. The confidence builds up.

comments.author: zoe
comments.content: Patterns matter more than difficulty. Recognize them.

comments.author: liam
comments.content: Focus on Excel, basic accounting, and talking to alumni.

comments.author: noah
comments.content: Data science has more career options if you like math.
